text.div:
• Include these codes as defined in http://fhir.org/guides/itech-uw/who-smart-hiv-dak/CodeSystem/concept-codes
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    HIV.G.DE23Test delayed to next contact or referredReason Hepatitis B test not conducted - Test delayed to next contact or referred
    HIV.G.DE24Stock-out or expiredReason Hepatitis B test not conducted - Stock-out or expired
    HIV.G.DE25Machine or technician not available or machine not functioningReason Hepatitis B test not conducted - Machine or technician not available or machine not functioning
    HIV.G.DE26Client declined / refused testReason Hepatitis B test not conducted - Client declined / refused test
    HIV.G.DE27OtherReason Hepatitis B test not conducted - Other

name: ReasonHepatitisBtestnotconductedCodes
title: Reason Hepatitis B test not conducted Codes
description: Codes representing possible values for the Reason Hepatitis B test not conducted element
